channel.title: [317] [PI Based] Notification and questtab problem
channel.description:
Hi everyone, I've got some questions about editing the quest tab and a notification that pops up when you login to the server. First the quest tab, atm it looks like this: [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2iawobq.png[/img] But how do I change the owners and the website/forum link? Then the notification: [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2qa23ol.png[/img] How do I edit the text in the notification? I tried to decompile the client.class file and edit the text, then compile it back and put it in the folder but then I would get an error while trying to login on the server. I hope you guys can help me out :D
- Rick

item.title: [317] [PI Based] Notification and questtab problem
item.dc:creator: @Camballer Camballer
item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

Go to your source folder and search the announcement, whichever files come up, press ctrl + f and search the announcement again, you should fine it, replace it with what you’d like. Then compile. Same with the quest tab.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] [PI Based] Notification and questtab problem
item.dc:creator: @043scape 043scape
item.description:
@043scape wrote:

[quote=“rova0, post:5, topic:450112”]Probably in the initialize() method if it’s on log in.

But I have a question for you: why are you working on a server that you don’t even have the source (.java) files for anyway?[/quote]
I have the .java files and edited them already and everything is still the same. So I searched with the program and all I found was the .class file and therefore I have to edit them I guess?

Read full topic

item.title: [317] [PI Based] Notification and questtab problem
item.dc:creator: @rova0 rova0
item.description:
@rova0 wrote:

Probably in the initialize() method if it’s on log in.

But I have a question for you: why are you working on a server that you don’t even have the source (.java) files for anyway?

Read full topic

item.title: [317] [PI Based] Notification and questtab problem
item.dc:creator: @043scape 043scape
item.description:
@043scape wrote:

Thanks for the help guys, but the file is not in there, meanwhile I’ve downloaded the program “Search and replace” and found in which files it is located. But both the files are .class files and I don’t know how to edit them properly. The last time I tried to edit them (with decompiling and compiling again) I got an error while trying to login to the server. It would say “Error connecting to the server”. So, anyone out there that can help me with editing .class files?

btw, I knew about the ::alert command, but the problem is this notification I showed you pops up automatically when you login.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] [PI Based] Notification and questtab problem
item.dc:creator: @ownedin3d ownedin3d
item.description:
@ownedin3d wrote:

i’m not sure, but i think it’s the Announcements in the Deps folder.

  • you can do ::alert, then you will notify peopel.

Read full topic

item.description:
@JZombie37 wrote:

It’s Server-Sided
as for what file I am unsure I haven’t changed it in a while I am working on 667/***
sorry
